Database Schema

Current database tables and structure

profiles

  • • id (uuid, primary key)
  • • user_id (uuid, foreign key)
  • • email (text)
  • • first_name (text)
  • • last_name (text)
  • • phone (text)
  • • role (text)
  • • created_at (timestamp)

accounts

  • • id (uuid, primary key)
  • • user_id (uuid, foreign key)
  • • account_number (text)
  • • available_balance (numeric)
  • • currency (text)
  • • status (text)
  • • created_at (timestamp)

transactions

  • • id (uuid, primary key)
  • • user_id (uuid, foreign key)
  • • type (text)
  • • amount (numeric)
  • • currency (text)
  • • status (text)
  • • description (text)
  • • created_at (timestamp)

pin_codes

  • • id (uuid, primary key)
  • • user_id (uuid, foreign key)
  • • pin_hash (text)
  • • created_at (timestamp)
  • • updated_at (timestamp)
